items.sentence: I didn\'t see any children playing on the swings.
Could you please speak louder? I can\'t hear you.
None of my children want to go to Boston with me.
Tom and Mary have been going out for three years.
Are you sure you don\'t want to go to the doctor?
Even though I didn\'t want to drink alone, I did.
Tom let me pick the songs we\'re playing tonight.
I think we should ask Tom where he wants to live.
I always carry a bottle of mineral water with me.
I don\'t think Tom knows when Mary will be there.
Tom isn\'t old enough to get a driver\'s license.
I\'m never going to be able to do that by myself.
I was able to sleep on the plane for a few hours.
Can you swallow all these pills at the same time?
Tom saw what was happening and started screaming.
Tom wanted Mary to come over for an early dinner.
Tom wanted Mary to go to the post office for him.
Tom wanted Mary to help him clean out the garage.
Tom wanted everybody to know that he was unhappy.
Do you really think you can sing better than Tom?
